content:
Windows:
    (1) Open a new empty porject in visual studio.
    (2) Put all .cpp files into "Source Files".
    (3) Put all .h files into "Header Files".
    (4) Press "start" button to compile and run.

Linux:
    (1) Open the command line interface.
    (1) Type "make" under server directory to compile.
    (2) Run "./chatroom".
